title: Toward a more resilient Thailand: Developing a machine learning-powered forest fire warning system

Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Jing Tang, Manapat Weeramongkolkul, Supanida Suwankesawong, Kumpol Saengtabtim, Natt Leelawat, Kritchart Wongwailikhit
